original_text: Also take these ten pieces of cheese to the officer who leads their group of soldiers. Find out whether your brothers are well. Bring something back to me to show how they are.
korean_text: 이 치즈 열 덩이를 가져다가 그들의 천부장에게 주고 네 형들의 안부를 살피고 증표를 가져오라

sentences.original_text: Also take these ten pieces of cheese
sentences.korean_translation: 또 이 치즈 열 덩어리를 가져가거라

sentences.original_text: to the officer who leads their group of soldiers
Find out whether your brothers are well
